title: National Park Registration System
description: Command-line application built with PostgreSQL and JDBC that allows users to reserve campsites at a national park

title: SpeedChat
description: A casual chat app allowing for chat rooms and instantaneous user communication using socket.io

title: Cartoon Clicky
description: An image clicking game site built with React. Do not click the same image twice!

title: Chicago Public School Map
description: Interactive map built with Mapbox.js that allows viewers to see information regarding different Chicago public schools

title: Jamspot
description: Music collaboration web app that allows musicians and vocalists to jam with each other and manage their performance

title: Newspro
description: Scraper web app that gathers news articles from New York Times and allows users to take notes and save to database

title: RoadSafe
description: Interactive map project that helps Chicagoans to report potholes right away and find out relevant information

title: National Solar Energy Analysis
description: Data visualization and analysis regarding solar energy usage in different states using ArcGIS and D3.js

title: Chicago Rats Be Gone (Static Plot Series)
description: Static data visualization series that helps policy makers track and analyze patterns of rat complaints in Chicago

title: Chicago Rats Be Gone (D3.js)
description: Interactive visualization series that helps policy makers track and analyze patterns of rat complaints in Chicago

title: Simple Weather App
description: A simple weather report application built with DarkSky API and handlebars.js

title: Friend Match-making App
description: A friend matchmaking app build with Node.js that allows users to submit a survey and find their best match

title: Animal Giffy!
description: Interesting website built with the Giffy API for users to find their favorite animal giffy

title: Detroit City Portal (modified jkan template)
description: Detroit city data portal interface built with the jkan template in Ruby

title: China Trivia
description: A timed quiz built with JQuery that tests how much users know about China

title: GoldToGo Vending Machine
description: Command-line vending machine built with Java OOP fundamentals under the TDD approach
